remarks: The Cartesian product of the domain and range of a relation is an upper bound for its transitive closure.  (Contributed by Richard Penner, 2-Jan-2020.)

trclub.rex $e |- R e. V $.
trclub $p |- |^| { s | ( R C_ s /\ ( s o. s ) C_ s ) } C_ ( dom R X. ran R ) $.
$d R s $.
